content:
- 'description': Educates employees on laws, regulations, and company policies
    that must be followed in the workplace.
  'id': 905eb42d57024f28b932497e
  'name': Compliance Training
  'attribute':
    2e18429e8ab74604bf9da514:
      'entity-description': The department that needs the training.
      'name': department
      'possible-values':
      - human_resources
      - sales
      - marketing
      - engineering
      - finance
    4e6d001023dc4d2db6896cf4:
      'entity-description': The employee role that needs the training.
      'name': employee_role
    d1aa4e9d420e4fecb3b04ce4:
      'entity-description': The type of compliance training required.
      'name': training_type
      'possible-values':
      - data_privacy
      - anti_harassment
      - code_of_conduct
      - health_and_safety
    fd4525ce17fb4a518f944de0:
      'entity-description': The language for the training.
      'name': language
- 'description': Refers to training programs designed for current employees
    to enhance their skills and knowledge.
  'id': f95c63bdc7644161bf6ca003
  'name': Existing Employee Training
  'attribute':
    a6527ecea4744b78a4913182:
      'entity-description': The method of the training.
      'name': training_method
    af3301beaf43447da9928425:
      'entity-description': The topic of the training.
      'name': training_topic
    b9293743df234d48bef1f7b0:
      'entity-description': The role of the employee who is getting trained.
      'name': employee_role
- 'description': Describes the process of moving up the career ladder to
    a higher-level position.
  'id': 31fc017af53749049568b97a
  'name': Career Advancement
  'attribute':
    3aaf317a271146d6b3c277fb:
      'entity-description': The level of training required for career advancement.
      'name': level
    52b21f672bd94d8dbfe24c44:
      'entity-description': The type of training to take for career advancement.
      'name': training_type
      'possible-values':
      - technical_skills
      - leadership_skills
      - project_management
      - communication_skills
      - sales_training
      - customer_service
      - computer_skills
      - data_analysis
    9dc3f9b82be246d2b19c34e6:
      'entity-description': The industry for which the training is intended.
      'name': industry
      'possible-values':
      - technology
      - healthcare
      - finance
      - manufacturing
      - retail
      - hospitality
      - education
      - government
    f73743e5613a4423927f2c46:
      'entity-description': The duration of the training program.
      'name': duration
- 'description': A program that introduces new employees to the company's
    culture, policies, and job responsibilities.
  'id': 037e826d000e45b98f0af545
  'name': New Hire Training
  'attribute':
    454a633ba4d74f63a493b6f9:
      'entity-description': The duration of the training.
      'name': duration
    62313c8975064a09a1bfa02c:
      'entity-description': The department where the new hire will work.
      'name': department
    e535139bf90944b286e0e98d:
      'entity-description': The job position of the new hire.
      'name': position
    fc110c234d9c4e1cbb541b71:
      'entity-description': The type of training for the new hire.
      'name': training_type
- 'description': Refers to the decline or backward movement in one's career
    path or level of responsibility.
  'id': 493c541d05f6452c8d7fe1d9
  'name': Career Regression
  'attribute':
    6346e3f316e74666b4fb58e7:
      'entity-description': The job position or role for the regression analysis.
      'name': position
      'possible-values':
      - software engineer
      - project manager
      - data analyst
      - sales representative
    90f2f48948bd4194b03f1f02:
      'entity-description': The salary range for the regression analysis.
      'name': salary
      'possible-values':
      - < 50k
      - 50k-80k
      - 80k-120k
      - '> 120k'
    f2f854d2698b4be18a103d26:
      'entity-description': The time period for the regression analysis.
      'name': time_period
    f34e43f115f24041b9c5a01d:
      'entity-description': The company name for the regression analysis.
      'name': company
      'possible-values':
      - IBM
      - Microsoft
      - Google
      - Amazon
      - Facebook
- 'description': Provides education and instruction on ethical issues and
    behavior in the workplace.
  'id': a0b8977d68994c46bed13a53
  'name': Ethics Training
  'attribute':
    2aa792217c06468aae8953b1:
      'entity-description': The type of ethics training to attend.
      'name': training_type
    6aa0836672634a3eb2eb79df:
      'entity-description': The specific ethics topic to cover in the training.
      'name': topic
      'possible-values':
      - code of conduct
      - conflict of interest
      - diversity and inclusion
      - harassment
      - privacy
    6aaa784b05b249e9b6d3677d:
      'entity-description': The length of the training session.
      'name': duration
    968e3a6a7f40414b9c546645:
      'entity-description': The name of the ethics training instructor.
      'name': instructor
      'possible-values':
      - John Doe
      - Jane Smith
      - Ethics Committee
      - Legal Department
- 'description': Involves learning and improving new or existing abilities
    that can be applied in a professional setting.
  'id': f6572a6928d145328189ed6c
  'name': Skills Development
  'attribute':
    1fa31d10bda74bea9322c32c:
      'entity-description': The organization or individual providing the training.
      'name': training_provider
      'possible-values':
      - internal HR
      - external vendor
      - industry association
      - online platform
      - in-house trainer
      - consultant
    576388ca5fc7486d898ee249:
      'entity-description': The specific skill the training is focused on.
      'name': skill
    dd8c79322d61483ebd5ccea1:
      'entity-description': The format of the training.
      'name': training_type
    e36d2a0adb1543e491f1047d:
      'entity-description': The length of the training.
      'name': duration
